pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, August 5, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, August 5, 2017:

Sidney, British Columbia

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will kayak near the Gulf Islands National Park Reserve.

Gulf Islands National Park Reserve
2220 Harbour Road

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:00 a.m. and will be shuttled to the island by Parks Canada

Tofino, British Columbia

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a regional roundtable.

Best Western Tin Wis Resort
1119 Pacific Rim Highway

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at beginning of the roundtable
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:15 p.m.

2:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable with local Indigenous leadership.

Best Western Tin Wis Resort
1119 Pacific Rim Highway

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at beginning of the roundtable
  • Media should arrive no later thank 1:15 p.m.

Note: all times local.
